refnamediv.refpurpose: Splits DN into its component parts

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
dn
The distinguished name of an LDAP entity.
with_attrib
Used to request if the RDNs are returned with only values or their attributes as well. To get RDNs with the attributes (i.e. in attribute=value format) set with_attrib to 0 and to get only values set it to 1.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an array of all DN components, &return.falseforfailure;. The first element in the array has count key and represents the number of returned values, next elements are numerically indexed DN components.
